About This Product

A fingerprint resistant refrigerator that is beautifully designed, with a modern dispenser, polished door, and sleek handles. The four door French refrigerator combines capacity and accessibility to make storing the foods you love easier. The Flex Zone Drawer helps keep a variety of food organized.

  • Adjustable shelves go from stand Ard to slide-in or flip-up, to store tall items with ease
  • Twin Cooling Plus technology has independent fridge and freezer temperature controlskeep food fresher longer
  • Ice Max large capacity, stores up to 10 lbs. of ice
  • High-Efficiency LED lighting designed to beautifully light up the interior of your fridge so you can quickly spot what you want.
  • Fingerprint resistant finish
  • Twin Cooling Plus technology has nearly commercial grade humidity levels, helps prevent spoiling and freezer burn
  • Power Freeze or Power Cool options lower the temperature with the push of a button to quickly freeze or chill your food
  • Ice Max - Large capacity, stores up to 48 lbs. of ice
  • Modern external filtered water
  • EZ-Open Handle on bottom freezer door.
  • ENERGY STAR Certified
  • Gallon door bins provide more shelf space inside the fridge
  • ADA compliant - easy to reach controls for everyone
